name: Lunar Rescue - An Upside Down Adventure
name_original: Lunar Rescue - An Upside Down Adventure
description:
From a galaxy far far away,  a planet occupied by beings that have gained control over gravity,  an unlikely duo of Father and Daughter are on an epic journey to explore cosmos. On their journey to cosmos, they come across the moon and decide to explore it.

Humans, who have already occupied the moon, abduct the daughter for research. Helpless father tries to rescue his daughter.

Controls 

PC:
A , D - Move Left and Right
SPACE - Jump
SHIFT - Change Gravity

X-360 Controller:
LEFT STICK - Move
A- Jump
RT - Change Gravity

 

Note: Download and play for best  experience

Github Source:
https://github.com/mdsrayyan/GameOff2020_Public
